body: this error does not occur when I build v0.16.0rc3, it just occur on master.
@practicalswift Can you take a look at this?

I'm also seeing this when attempting to do a Windows Gitian build for my own commit on top of master, and not getting the error for the same commit on top of `v0.16rc3`.

Why do the Travis Windows builds not have this issue?
@Sjors We skip the qt build for windows on travis

Hi, glad this is been reported. I have the same issue. Im trying to build from WSL in win10. I have ubuntu 16 there. I'm following the windows guide for 64 bit

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/build-windows.md
